Title: I Am Mother
Writer: Michael Lloyd Green (screenplay by), Grant Sputore (story by), Michael Lloyd Green (story by)
Actors: Luke Hawker, Rose Byrne, Maddie Lenton, Hazel Sandery
Plot: In the wake of humanity's extinction, a teenage girl is raised by a robot designed to repopulate the earth. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.
Production: Rhea Films, The Penguin Empire, Southern Light Films
